name: Among EastVille's trees
description:
Controls: Pass the text by pressing Enter on the keyboard

Pick the questions with your mouse

------------------

A teenager was found tied to a tree near a hut in the middle of the forest of EastVille around 2 am still alive.

The allegations are of kidnapping and attempted murder.

You are the detective in charge of questioning the teenager and all the suspects found around the area: the owner of the hut, a tycoon and a nurse of the General Hospital of EastVille.

Analyze, follow the clues and make your own decision on how to end this case.

----------------------------

A game developed in three days for the Mini Jam 103: Darkness!

This game was made by a group of three people:

Derick "Jenkins"  - Writter (twitter// instagram)

Felipe "Kikito" - Programmer

Thaís "Benny" - Artist and UI Designer (itchio // twitter // instagram)

Please leave a comment and feedback for the game!
